main event: Mr. and Mrs. Carpenter observed a round, disc-shaped craft hovering silently in the sky on July 7, 1968.
interesting points: The object had a metallic appearance and hovered for several minutes before accelerating rapidly., The sighting occurred in clear weather conditions with temperatures around 65-70 degrees Fahrenheit., The observers reported no sound during the observation., This case was documented in an official letter from the Air Force regarding UFO observations., The investigation was under the auspices of Project Blue Book.
